Title: Relates to the creation of an ATV recreation fund and the use of ATVs
Summary: Relates to the creation of an ATV recreation fund and the use of ATVs.
LawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
LawCode: Add Title D Art 26 §26.01, Pks & Rec L; amd §§2282, 2411 & 2281, add §2414, V & T L; add §99-ss, St Fin L; amd §§1-0303 & 9-0303, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, the vehicle and traffic law, the state finance law and the environmental conservation law, in relation to the creation of an ATV recreation fund and the use of ATVs
